name: Ecowave
description:
This game is meant to be a journey that teaches about the differences between different types of power sources us humans use to complete tasks.

Many of the assets and shaders come from the Unity asset pack 'Quibli'. 

I plan to use the pack as a jumping off point and edit many of the premade assets to fit with the story I am trying to tell.

Enjoy!

I appreciate any feedback.
